name: Timber Tycoon
description:
Build and expand a large-scale woodworking factory! Buy equipment, hire employees, and start production. Run operations with a careful hand and automate production processes. Your employees will keep working even after you close the game!

Features:
— More than 60 different products to manufacture.
— More than 30 unique production machines.
— More than 20 different types of employees (workers, product engineers, technicians, management personnel).
— Increase the quality of your products and earn more profits.
— Modernize your equipment, increasing efficiency, reliability, and service life.
— Train your employees, pay them bonuses, and increase productivity.
— Invest in building new workshops and expand production.
— Compete against other players for the title of Greatest Industrial Magnate.
— Open the game every day for a reward.
— Analyze statistics and make the right strategic choices.
— The game can be played offline.

Have issues or suggestions?
Email us at help@evalgames.com, we always love to hear from players!
